We need some permissions to continue Videona needs some permissions to use the camera or record audio.
Without them Videona can't continue and will be closed. We need those permissions to take awesome videos with Videona! Go to settings Permissions not granted

Hello! 

First of all I would like to thank you for your participation in ViMoJo, all the members of the team wish you the best user experience.

Our company is called Videona and we are willing to build the best MoJo app ever, just by your side. Will you help us?

The best way to do this is sharing your experience with us through our channel vimojo.slack.com. We use it essentially to communicate information about us and understand more thoroughly your needs and petitions. Many thanks to all of you whom are participating. You are the best! 

In Videona we design video apps for Android and iOS mobile devices.

VIMOJO, THE MOBILE JOURNALISM ERA.

ViMoJo (Videona for Mobile Journalism) enables journalists and professional cameramen to tell the story they want to, at the moment they need to do so. We are here to change the way media professionals use mobile technology in their information stream, breaking the editing barrier.

Behind this app there is a young and talented group of entrepreneurs that is trying to create the best video editor ever for smartphones. Our app tries to break the editing barrier and shake the audiovisual world within smartphones. Will you help us? 

We need you to build and improve the tool with which we are stirring up journalism. 

All the team thanks you for participating in the experience. 

P.D.: If you are interested in hiring the products please don't hesitate to contact us. 

Videona Socialmedia S.L 
CIF: B-87047171 
Spain - Madrid 

Copyright 2017. Videona Socialmedia S.L. All rights reserved.

http://www.videona.com Contact us Visit our web page: http://www.videona.com
 Join our Slack web channel: http://vimojo.slack.com
 Version Videona ViMoJo beta With love from in Madrid - Spain
